en.name: Shihao Li
en.title: Master's Candidate in AI at Nanjing University
en.bio: Currently, I am pursuing a Master’s degree in Artificial Intelligence at the School of Intelligence Science and Technology, Nanjing University, under the supervision of Professor [Liu Jiaheng](https://liujiaheng.github.io/). As one of the founders of the LINK Lab, my research focuses on pre-training, post-training, and evaluation of large-scale models. I am dedicated to developing intelligent systems that benefit human society.
en.labName:
LINK:
Large-scale Intelligence and Knowledge Group

publications.title: MVU-Eval: Towards Multi-Video Understanding Evaluation for Multimodal LLMs
publications.authors: Tianhao Peng*, Haochen Wang*, Yuanxing Zhang*, Zekun Moore Wang, Zili Wang, Ge Zhang, Jian Yang, **Shihao Li**, Yanghai Wang, Jiaheng Liu† et al. (6 additional authors not shown)

publications.title: OmniBench: Towards The Future of Universal Omni-Language Models
publications.authors: Yizhi LI*, Ge Zhang*†, Yinghao Ma*, Ruibin Yuan, King Zhu, Hangyu Guo, Yiming Liang, Jiaheng Liu, Zekun Moore Wang, Jian Yang, Yanghai Wang, **Shihao Li**, Chenghua Lin† et al. (10 additional authors not shown)

zh.name: 李世昊
zh.title: 南京大学人工智能硕士研究生
zh.bio: 目前，我正在南京大学智能科学与技术学院攻读人工智能硕士学位，师从[刘佳恒](https://liujiaheng.github.io/)教授。我是 LINK 实验的创始人之一，我的研究方向包括大模型的预训练、后训练以及评测等。我致力于开发有益于人类社会生产生活的智能系统。
